channel.title: Editing
channel.description: WEll This Might kind of gay, But i am starting a new server. Everything is perfect except two little things. One: I want to Change the home location, when you first log in, and on the mage varrock tele is home and i want to change it so when you click it it goes to my new home. And Second is that i would love if someone could edit me a really good picture/banner. The name of my server is HazeScape. Thanks

WEll This Might kind of gay, But i am starting a new server.
Everything is perfect except two little things.

I want to Change the home location, when you first log in, and on the mage varrock tele is home and i want to change it so when you click it it goes to my new home.
